body:
trinotate originally placed a runtime config used by lighttpd within the spack prefix but this fails with permissions on shared installations. patched code moves the configuration to ~/.trinotate_lighttpd.conf.portXXXX to fix this.

perl-dbd-mysql was removed as it is not actually used by the package (in favor of perl-dbd-sqlite)
title: trinotate: remove perl-dbd-mysql, move runtime files to HOME
